... Respondents
PRAYER: Writ Petition is filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India to issue a Writ of Mandamus, directing the respondents to grant
permission to the petitioner to newly run Aavin Milk Booth in the land in
T.S.No.813, Ward No.5 situated at Near Roundana, Bharathpuram,
Mettupatti Road, Dindigul District based on the petitioner's representation
dated 17.12.2019.
For Petitioner :

Mrs.J.Padmavathi Devi, learned Special Government Pleader takes
notice on behalf of the respondents 1 to 3.
2. By consent, the writ petition is taken up for disposal at the
admission stage itself.
3. The writ petition has been filed by the petitioner praying for
issuance of a Writ of Mandamus, directing the respondents to grant
permission to the petitioner to newly run Aavin Milk Booth in the land in
T.S.No.813, Ward No.5 situated at Near Roundana, Bharathpuram,
Mettupatti Road, Dindigul District based on the petitioner's representation
dated 17.12.2019.
4.The case of the petitioner is that, he obtained a license from the
General Manager, Aavin Milk, Dindigul District on 10.01.2019 for running
Aavin Milk Booth in the above said property. Subsequently, the petitioner
PUSHPA SATHYANARAYANA, J.
